author: CBC News
title: Customers of Kamloops pharmacy asked to isolate, monitor for COVID-19 symptoms
description: Interior Health officials are asking people who went to the Save-On-Foods pharmacy in Columbia Place Shopping Centre in Kamloops, March 10, 13 and 14 along with March 16 to 21 to self-isolate following a positive case of COVID-19 at the store.
content:
Interior Health officials are asking people who went to the Save-On-Foods pharmacy in Columbia Place Shopping Centre in Kamloops, B.C., on March 10, 13 and 14 along with March 16 to 21 to self-isolate following a positive case of COVID-19 at the store.
